name: Spined Devil
damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
descriptions: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Flyby.
descriptions: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Limited Spines.
descriptions: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fork.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft ., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
